metaData.title: Accommodation Rosia Montana
metaData.text: Stay in a heritage house from the Historic Center of Roșia Montana, recently renovated with bathrooms and kitchen access. See also the hiking and bike trails to discover our area: roman galleries, gold mining industry, patrimony buildings, mountains, lakes and many more. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania - Romania.

headline.title: Plan your visit to Roșia Montană

specificArticles.text: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana 331, in a heritage house, that was a bank, medical center, cinema and then it was bought by our grandparents who work in mining industry, and used for living. We preserved the painting, the wooden floor, the windows, the heating with terracotta stoves, but we added new bathrooms and kitchen so now we offer accommodation, guided tours and bikes. The rooms (houses) have separate entries from a common yard with hammocks, gazebo, green grass and a nice view to the Cânic massif.

specificArticles.title: Books house
specificArticles.text:
In the past here was a bank where the miners changed the gold in money and dynamite, has one meter wide walls made of rocks, a room with 2 bunk beds and a closet filled with old books, bath and kitchenette.
max 4 persons - wifi - private bathroom - kitchenette - library

images.text: Books house - We transformed a cupboard into a library with old books, guides about Rosia Montana and board games.
Books house - In the showcase are old photos and crystal clusters rocks.
Books house - private bathroom and kitchenette (equipped with: coffee/tea machine, fridge, microwave, dishes and cutlery).

specificArticles.title: Little house
specificArticles.text:
This place was the old summer house, it has one room with two beds, bathroom and kitchen
max 2 persons - wifi - private bathroom - kitchen - library

images.text: Little house - the beds can be joined. The library contains maps, books and guides about Roșia Montană
Little house room - the entrance in the private bathroom and kitchen are directly from the room. The heating is done by a terracotta stove on woods.
Little house room - private bathroom and kitchenette (equipped with: coffee/tea machine, fridge, hob, sink, microwave, dishes and cutlery).

specificArticles.title: Tarnat house
specificArticles.text:
The 'tarnat' has 2 rooms with some old and well preserved characteristics: the access through 'tarant' (an external hallway with small windows), the almost 100 years old painting, mine flowers and embroidery exhibits, a small living connected to the bathroom and kitchenette
max 3 persons/room (6 in total) - wifi - bathroom - kitchenette - library

images.text: Tarnat room 1 - has one double bed and an extendable bed for 1 person.
Tarnat room 2 - has a double bed (that can be separated) and 1 person bed.
Tarnat living - with living, library and bath.
Tarnat bath and kitchenette (equipped with: coffee/tea machine, fridge, microwave, dishes and cutlery).

specificArticles.text:
Food - let us know in advance if you need hot meals or local products (jam, syrup, cheese, milk).
Bikes for rent, bike repair, bike tours.
Guided tours through the historic center, natural monuments, mining galleries and pits.
Wifi, board games, library.
Backyard with hammocks, gazebo, green grass.
Playground for children - near the house
Movie screenings in the garden with documentaries about Rosia Montana
Sleighing - we have 2 sleighs so during the winter there are sleigh slopes near the house

images.text: Food - local products or hot meals.
We offer guided tours (by foot or bike) and we also rent bikes.
In the backyard we have hammocks, wifi, gazebo, movie screenings.
